TextBlock.Text: ANALYTICNOMAI: Unfortunately, this body may simply be too small for any effective structures to be built here.
CURIOUSNOMAI: It may still have some use. For instance, I believe that this rock may be showing us a possible escape!
SPOOKEDNOMAI: CURIOUSNOMAI might be correct! Looking past this wall, I can just barely make out a place where the wood seems to end!
NOMAILEADER: If this is true, we should investigate this immediately. Escaping this place is our first step towards finding the <color=orange>Eye</color>.
ANALYTICNOMAI: I would caution you against raising your hopes, CURIOUSNOMAI, we have already seen that our environment is far from easy to navigate.
